channel.title: Can wild be used in IP banns? HOW CAN I BAN Internet provider?
channel.description:
Ok so this idiot on my server keeps coming back with the same internet provider but diff ip..
Is there a way I can ban the internet provider? acanac.net
I am using Dodian V7. Not sure how good the Ip ban is on there
